cnmessagingsdk.loment.sdk.crypto

Interface DataCrypter


  • public interface DataCrypter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decryptData(byte[] data, Key key, boolean hasPadding) 
      void decryptStream(java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out, Key key, long inSize, long outSize)

    • Method Detail

      • decryptData

        byte[] decryptData(byte[] data,
                 Key key,
                 boolean hasPadding)
                   throws CryptoException
        Parameters:
        data - Data that was encrypted via encryptData(byte[], Key)
        key - Same Key objected used to encrypt the data.
        hasPadding - Whether to remove trailing 0s after decryption.
        Returns:
        The data decrypted.
        Throws:
        CryptoException

      • decryptStream

        void decryptStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                 java.io.OutputStream out,
                 Key key,
                 long inSize,
                 long outSize)
                   throws CryptoException
        Parameters:
        in - Data that was encrypted.
        out - The decrypted data.
        key - Object that implements Key, for use in encrypting the data.
        inSize - size of the encrypted 'in' stream, in bytes.
        outSize - the original file size, in bytes. -1 if unknown.
        Throws:
        CryptoException

      • encryptData

        byte[] encryptData(byte[] data,
                 Key key)
        Parameters:
        data - Data to be encrypted.
        key - Object that implements Key, for use in encrypting the data.
        Returns:
        The encrypted data.

      • encryptStream

        void encryptStream(java.io.InputStream in,
                 java.io.OutputStream out,
                 Key key)
        Parameters:
        in - Data to be encrypted.
        out - The encrypted data.
        key - Object that implements Key, for use in encrypting the data.
